pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hippie Code Completion in 'RStudio' // An 'RStudio' Addin for Hippie Expand (AKA Hippie Code Completion or Cyclic Expand Word). This type of completion searches for matching tokens within the user's current source editor file, regardless of file type. By searching only within the current source file, 'hippie' offers a fast way to identify and insert completions that appear around the user's cursor.
